mapper.select: SELECT bno, case when category = 1 then '공지' when category = 2 then '자유' when category = 3 then '의뢰' end as category, content, title, writer, post_date as postDate, email, bview as bView, (select count(*) from board_reply br inner join board bi on bi.bno = br.bno) as bReply FROM board where bno = #{bno}
